accessor-pairs.description: Enforce getter and setter pairs in objects and classes

array-callback-return.description: Enforce `return` statements in callbacks of array methods

arrow-parens.description: Require parentheses around arrow function arguments

block-scoped-var.description: Enforce the use of variables within the scope they are defined

default-case-last.description: Enforce default clauses in switch statements to be last

for-direction.description: Enforce "for" loop update clause moving the counter in the right direction

new-cap.description: Require constructor names to begin with a capital letter

no-async-promise-executor.description: Disallow using an async function as a Promise executor

no-case-declarations.description: Disallow lexical declarations in case clauses

no-cond-assign.description: Disallow assignment operators in conditional expressions

no-constant-binary-expression.description: Disallow expressions where the operation doesn't affect the value

no-control-regex.description: Disallow control characters in regular expressions

no-dupe-else-if.description: Disallow duplicate conditions in if-else-if chains

no-dupe-keys.description: Disallow duplicate keys in object literals

no-empty-character-class.description: Disallow empty character classes in regular expressions

no-global-assign.description: Disallow assignments to native objects or read-only global variables

no-invalid-this.description: Disallow use of `this` in contexts where the value of `this` is `undefined`

no-invalid-regexp.description: Disallow invalid regular expression strings in `RegExp` constructors

no-iterator.description: Disallow the use of the `__iterator__` property

no-loss-of-precision.description: Disallow literal numbers that lose precision

no-misleading-character-class.description: Disallow characters which are made with multiple code points in character class syntax

no-new.description: Disallow `new` operators outside of assignments or comparisons

no-new-wrappers.description: Disallow `new` operators with the `String`, `Number`, and `Boolean` objects

no-obj-calls.description: Disallow calling global object properties as functions

no-object-constructor.description: Disallow calls to the `Object` constructor without an argument

no-octal-escape.description: Disallow octal escape sequences in string literals

no-promise-executor-return.description: Disallow returning values from Promise executor functions

no-proto.description: Disallow the use of the `__proto__` property

no-prototype-builtins.description: Disallow calling some `Object.prototype` methods directly on objects

no-regex-spaces.description: Disallow multiple spaces in regular expressions

no-restricted-properties.description: Disallow certain properties on certain objects

no-self-assign.description: Disallow assignments where both sides are exactly the same

no-self-compare.description: Disallow comparisons where both sides are exactly the same

no-shadow-restricted-names.description: Disallow identifiers from shadowing restricted names

no-template-curly-in-string.description: Disallow template literal placeholder syntax in regular strings

no-undef.description: Disallow the use of undeclared variables unless mentioned in `/*global */` comments

no-unneeded-ternary.description: Disallow ternary operators when simpler alternatives exist

no-unreachable.description: Disallow unreachable code after `return`, `throw`, `continue`, and `break` statements

no-unreachable-loop.description: Disallow loops with a body that allows only one iteration

no-unsafe-finally.description: Disallow control flow statements in `finally` blocks

no-unsafe-negation.description: Disallow negating the left operand of relational operators

no-use-before-define.description: Disallow the use of variables before they are defined

no-useless-backreference.description: Disallow useless backreferences in regular expressions

no-useless-computed-key.description: Disallow unnecessary computed property keys in objects and classes

no-useless-rename.description: Disallow renaming import, export, and destructured assignments to the same name

object-shorthand.description: Require or disallow method and property shorthand syntax for object literals

one-var.description: Enforce variables to be declared either together or separately in functions

prefer-arrow-callback.description: Require using arrow functions for callbacks

prefer-const.description: Require `const` declarations for variables that are never reassigned after declared

prefer-exponentiation-operator.description: Disallow the use of `Math.pow` in favor of the `**` operator

prefer-promise-reject-errors.description: Require using Error objects as Promise rejection reasons

prefer-regex-literals.description: Disallow use of the `RegExp` constructor in favor of regular expression literals

prefer-template.description: Require template literals instead of string concatenation

sort-imports.description: Enforce sorted import declarations within modules

unicode-bom.description: Require or disallow Unicode byte order mark (BOM)

use-isnan.description: Require calls to `isNaN()` when checking for `NaN`

valid-typeof.description: Enforce comparing `typeof` expressions against valid strings

vars-on-top.description: Require `var` declarations be placed at the top of their containing scope

eslint-comments/no-aggregating-enable.description: disallow a `eslint-enable` comment for multiple `eslint-disable` comments

node/no-callback-literal.description: enforce Node.js-style error-first callback pattern is followed

node/process-exit-as-throw.description: require that `process.exit()` expressions use the same code path as `throw`

jsdoc/check-access.description: Checks that `@access` tags have a valid value.

jsdoc/check-alignment.description: Reports invalid alignment of JSDoc block asterisks.

jsdoc/check-param-names.description: Ensures that parameter names in JSDoc match those in the function declaration.

jsdoc/check-property-names.description: Ensures that property names in JSDoc are not duplicated on the same block and that nested properties have defined roots.

jsdoc/empty-tags.description: Expects specific tags to be empty of any content.

jsdoc/implements-on-classes.description: Reports an issue with any non-constructor function using `@implements`.

jsdoc/multiline-blocks.description: Controls how and whether jsdoc blocks can be expressed as single or multiple line blocks.

jsdoc/no-defaults.description: This rule reports defaults being used on the relevant portion of `@param` or `@default`.

jsdoc/no-types.description: This rule reports types being used on `@param` or `@returns`.

jsdoc/require-param-name.description: Requires that all function parameters have names.

jsdoc/require-property.description: Requires that all `@typedef` and `@namespace` tags have `@property` when their type is a plain `object`, `Object`, or `PlainObject`.

jsdoc/require-property-description.description: Requires that each `@property` tag has a `description` value.

jsdoc/require-property-name.description: Requires that all function `@property` tags have names.

jsdoc/require-returns-check.description: Requires a return statement in function body if a `@returns` tag is specified in jsdoc comment.

jsdoc/require-returns-description.description: Requires that the `@returns` tag has a `description` value.

jsdoc/require-yields-check.description: Requires a yield statement in function body if a `@yields` tag is specified in jsdoc comment.

jsdoc/valid-types.description: Requires all types to be valid JSDoc or Closure compiler types without syntax errors.

import/export.description: Forbid any invalid exports, i.e. re-export of the same name.

import/first.description: Ensure all imports appear before other statements.

import/newline-after-import.description: Enforce a newline after import statements.

import/no-duplicates.description: Forbid repeated import of the same module in multiple places.

import/no-mutable-exports.description: Forbid the use of mutable exports with `var` or `let`.

import/no-self-import.description: Forbid a module from importing itself.

import/no-webpack-loader-syntax.description: Forbid webpack loader syntax in imports.

import/order.description: Enforce a convention in module import order.

vinicunca/no-import-node-modules-by-path.description: Prevent importing modules in `node_modules` folder by relative or absolute path

unicorn/error-message.description: Enforce passing a `message` value when creating a built-in error.

unicorn/escape-case.description: Require escape sequences to use uppercase values.

unicorn/no-new-buffer.description: Enforce the use of `Buffer.from()` and `Buffer.alloc()` instead of the deprecated `new Buffer()`.

unicorn/number-literal-case.description: Enforce proper case for numeric literals.

unicorn/prefer-includes.description: Prefer `.includes()` over `.indexOf()` and `Array#some()` when checking for existence or non-existence.

unicorn/prefer-node-protocol.description: Prefer using the `node:` protocol when importing Node.js builtin modules.

unicorn/prefer-number-properties.description: Prefer `Number` static properties over global ones.

unicorn/prefer-type-error.description: Enforce throwing `TypeError` in type checking conditions.

no-dupe-keys.description: Disallow duplicate keys in object literals

no-obj-calls.description: Disallow calling global object properties as functions

no-undef.description: Disallow the use of undeclared variables unless mentioned in `/*global */` comments

no-unreachable.description: Disallow unreachable code after `return`, `throw`, `continue`, and `break` statements

no-unsafe-negation.description: Disallow negating the left operand of relational operators

prefer-const.description: Require `const` declarations for variables that are never reassigned after declared

ts/ban-ts-comment.description: Disallow `@ts-<directive>` comments or require descriptions after directives

ts/no-dynamic-delete.description: Disallow using the `delete` operator on computed key expressions

ts/no-invalid-void-type.description: Disallow `void` type outside of generic or return types

no-loss-of-precision.description: Disallow literal numbers that lose precision

ts/no-loss-of-precision.description: Disallow literal numbers that lose precision

ts/no-non-null-asserted-nullish-coalesci.description: Disallow non-null assertions in the left operand of a nullish coalescing operator

ts/no-non-null-asserted-optional-chain.description: Disallow non-null assertions after an optional chain expression

ts/no-non-null-assertion.description: Disallow non-null assertions using the `!` postfix operator

ts/no-unnecessary-type-constraint.description: Disallow unnecessary constraints on generic types

ts/no-var-requires.description: Disallow `require` statements except in import statements

ts/prefer-as-const.description: Enforce the use of `as const` over literal type

ts/prefer-literal-enum-member.description: Require all enum members to be literal values

ts/triple-slash-reference.description: Disallow certain triple slash directives in favor of ES6-style import declarations

ts/unified-signatures.description: Disallow two overloads that could be unified into one with a union or an optional/rest parameter

no-invalid-this.description: Disallow use of `this` in contexts where the value of `this` is `undefined`

ts/no-invalid-this.description: Disallow `this` keywords outside of classes or class-like objects

no-use-before-define.description: Disallow the use of variables before they are defined

ts/no-use-before-define.description: Disallow the use of variables before they are defined

ts/consistent-type-definitions.description: Enforce type definitions to consistently use either `interface` or `type`

ts/consistent-type-imports.description: Enforce consistent usage of type imports

ts/explicit-function-return-type.description: Require explicit return types on functions and class methods

ts/explicit-member-accessibility.description: Require explicit accessibility modifiers on class properties and methods

ts/explicit-module-boundary-types.description: Require explicit return and argument types on exported functions' and classes' public class methods

ts/naming-convention.description: Enforce naming conventions for everything across a codebase

ts/no-empty-interface.description: Disallow the declaration of empty interfaces

ts/parameter-properties.description: Require or disallow parameter properties in class constructors

vinicunca/named-tuple-spacing.description: Expect space before type declaration in named tuple

import/no-duplicates.description: Forbid repeated import of the same module in multiple places.

ts/no-var-requires.description: Disallow `require` statements except in import statements

curly.description: Enforce consistent brace style for all control statements

style/array-bracket-newline.description: Enforce linebreaks after opening and before closing array brackets

style/array-bracket-spacing.description: Enforce consistent spacing inside array brackets

style/array-element-newline.description: Enforce line breaks after each array element

style/arrow-spacing.description: Enforce consistent spacing before and after the arrow in arrow functions

style/block-spacing.description: Disallow or enforce spaces inside of blocks after opening block and before closing block

style/brace-style.description: Enforce consistent brace style for blocks

style/comma-spacing.description: Enforce consistent spacing before and after commas

style/computed-property-spacing.description: Enforce consistent spacing inside computed property brackets

style/dot-location.description: Enforce consistent newlines before and after dots

style/eol-last.description: Require or disallow newline at the end of files

style/func-call-spacing.description: Require or disallow spacing between function identifiers and their invocations

style/key-spacing.description: Enforce consistent spacing between property names and type annotations in types and interfaces

style/keyword-spacing.description: Enforce consistent spacing before and after keywords

style/lines-between-class-members.description: Require or disallow an empty line between class members

style/max-statements-per-line.description: Enforce a maximum number of statements allowed per line

style/member-delimiter-style.description: Require a specific member delimiter style for interfaces and type literals

style/multiline-ternary.description: Enforce newlines between operands of ternary expressions

style/new-parens.description: Enforce or disallow parentheses when invoking a constructor with no arguments

style/no-floating-decimal.description: Disallow leading or trailing decimal points in numeric literals

style/no-mixed-spaces-and-tabs.description: Disallow mixed spaces and tabs for indentation

style/no-trailing-spaces.description: Disallow trailing whitespace at the end of lines

style/object-curly-newline.description: Enforce consistent line breaks after opening and before closing braces

style/object-property-newline.description: Enforce placing object properties on separate lines

style/operator-linebreak.description: Enforce consistent linebreak style for operators

style/padded-blocks.description: Require or disallow padding within blocks

style/quote-props.description: Require quotes around object literal property names

style/quotes.description: Enforce the consistent use of either backticks, double, or single quotes

style/rest-spread-spacing.description: Enforce spacing between rest and spread operators and their expressions

style/semi.description: Require or disallow semicolons instead of ASI

style/semi-spacing.description: Enforce consistent spacing before and after semicolons

style/space-before-function-paren.description: Enforce consistent spacing before function parenthesis

style/space-unary-ops.description: Enforce consistent spacing before or after unary operators

style/spaced-comment.description: Enforce consistent spacing after the `//` or `/*` in a comment

style/template-curly-spacing.description: Require or disallow spacing around embedded expressions of template strings

style/template-tag-spacing.description: Require or disallow spacing between template tags and their literals

style/type-annotation-spacing.description: Require consistent spacing around type annotations

style/yield-star-spacing.description: Require or disallow spacing around the `*` in `yield*` expressions

vinicunca/consistent-list-newline.description: Having line breaks styles to object, array and named imports

vinicunca/top-level-function.description: Enforce top-level functions to be declared with function keyword

test/consistent-test-it.description: Prefer test or it but not both

test/prefer-hooks-in-order.description: Prefer having hooks in consistent order

vue/jsx-uses-vars.description: prevent variables used in JSX to be marked as unused

vue/multi-word-component-names.description: require component names to be always multi-word

vue/no-arrow-functions-in-watch.description: disallow using arrow functions to define watcher

vue/no-async-in-computed-properties.description: disallow asynchronous actions in computed properties

vue/no-child-content.description: disallow element's child contents which would be overwritten by a directive like `v-html` or `v-text`

vue/no-deprecated-data-object-declaratio.description: disallow using deprecated object declaration on data (in Vue.js 3.0.0+)

vue/no-deprecated-destroyed-lifecycle.description: disallow using deprecated `destroyed` and `beforeDestroy` lifecycle hooks (in Vue.js 3.0.0+)

vue/no-deprecated-events-api.description: disallow using deprecated events api (in Vue.js 3.0.0+)

vue/no-deprecated-filter.description: disallow using deprecated filters syntax (in Vue.js 3.0.0+)

vue/no-deprecated-functional-template.description: disallow using deprecated the `functional` template (in Vue.js 3.0.0+)

vue/no-deprecated-html-element-is.description: disallow using deprecated the `is` attribute on HTML elements (in Vue.js 3.0.0+)

vue/no-deprecated-props-default-this.description: disallow deprecated `this` access in props default function (in Vue.js 3.0.0+)

vue/no-deprecated-router-link-tag-prop.description: disallow using deprecated `tag` property on `RouterLink` (in Vue.js 3.0.0+)

vue/no-deprecated-v-bind-sync.description: disallow use of deprecated `.sync` modifier on `v-bind` directive (in Vue.js 3.0.0+)

vue/no-deprecated-v-on-number-modifiers.description: disallow using deprecated number (keycode) modifiers (in Vue.js 3.0.0+)

vue/no-ref-as-operand.description: disallow use of value wrapped by `ref()` (Composition API) as an operand

vue/no-reserved-component-names.description: disallow the use of reserved names in component definitions

vue/no-shared-component-data.description: enforce component's data property to be a function

vue/no-side-effects-in-computed-properti.description: disallow side effects in computed properties

vue/no-unused-components.description: disallow registering components that are not used inside templates

vue/no-unused-vars.description: disallow unused variable definitions of v-for directives or scope attributes

vue/no-use-computed-property-like-method.description: disallow use computed property like method

vue/no-use-v-if-with-v-for.description: disallow using `v-if` on the same element as `v-for`

vue/no-v-for-template-key-on-child.description: disallow key of `<template v-for>` placed on child elements

vue/prefer-import-from-vue.description: enforce import from 'vue' instead of import from '@vue/*'

vue/require-prop-type-constructor.description: require prop type to be a constructor

vue/require-render-return.description: enforce render function to always return value

vue/require-slots-as-functions.description: enforce properties of `$slots` to be used as a function

vue/require-toggle-inside-transition.description: require control the display of the content inside `<transition>`

vue/require-valid-default-prop.description: enforce props default values to be valid

vue/return-in-computed-property.description: enforce that a return statement is present in computed property

vue/return-in-emits-validator.description: enforce that a return statement is present in emits validator

vue/attribute-hyphenation.description: enforce attribute naming style on custom components in template

vue/component-definition-name-casing.description: enforce specific casing for component definition name

vue/first-attribute-linebreak.description: enforce the location of first attribute

vue/html-closing-bracket-newline.description: require or disallow a line break before tag's closing brackets

vue/html-closing-bracket-spacing.description: require or disallow a space before tag's closing brackets

vue/html-quotes.description: enforce quotes style of HTML attributes

vue/max-attributes-per-line.description: enforce the maximum number of attributes per line

vue/multiline-html-element-content-newli.description: require a line break before and after the contents of a multiline element

vue/mustache-interpolation-spacing.description: enforce unified spacing in mustache interpolations

vue/no-spaces-around-equal-signs-in-attr.description: disallow spaces around equal signs in attribute

vue/no-template-shadow.description: disallow variable declarations from shadowing variables declared in the outer scope

vue/one-component-per-file.description: enforce that each component should be in its own file

vue/prop-name-casing.description: enforce specific casing for the Prop name in Vue components

vue/require-explicit-emits.description: require `emits` option with name triggered by `$emit()`

vue/singleline-html-element-content-newl.description: require a line break before and after the contents of a singleline element

vue/v-on-event-hyphenation.description: enforce v-on event naming style on custom components in template

vue/component-tags-order.description: enforce order of component top-level elements

vue/no-multiple-slot-args.description: disallow to pass multiple arguments to scoped slots

vue/no-v-html.description: disallow use of v-html to prevent XSS attack

vue/order-in-components.description: enforce order of properties in components

vue/array-bracket-spacing.description: Enforce consistent spacing inside array brackets in `<template>`

vue/arrow-spacing.description: Enforce consistent spacing before and after the arrow in arrow functions in `<template>`

vue/block-order.description: enforce order of component top-level elements

vue/block-spacing.description: Disallow or enforce spaces inside of blocks after opening block and before closing block in `<template>`

vue/block-tag-newline.description: enforce line breaks after opening and before closing block-level tags

vue/brace-style.description: Enforce consistent brace style for blocks in `<template>`

vue/comma-dangle.description: Require or disallow trailing commas in `<template>`

vue/comma-spacing.description: Enforce consistent spacing before and after commas in `<template>`

vue/component-name-in-template-casing.description: enforce specific casing for the component naming style in template

vue/component-options-name-casing.description: enforce the casing of component name in `components` options

vue/custom-event-name-casing.description: enforce specific casing for custom event name

vue/define-macros-order.description: enforce order of `defineEmits` and `defineProps` compiler macros

vue/dot-location.description: Enforce consistent newlines before and after dots in `<template>`

vue/dot-notation.description: Enforce dot notation whenever possible in `<template>`

vue/eqeqeq.description: Require the use of `===` and `!==` in `<template>`

vue/html-comment-content-spacing.description: enforce unified spacing in HTML comments

vue/key-spacing.description: Enforce consistent spacing between keys and values in object literal properties in `<template>`

vue/keyword-spacing.description: Enforce consistent spacing before and after keywords in `<template>`

vue/no-constant-condition.description: Disallow constant expressions in conditions in `<template>`

vue/no-loss-of-precision.description: Disallow literal numbers that lose precision in `<template>`

vue/no-setup-props-reactivity-loss.description: disallow usages that lose the reactivity of `props` passed to `setup`

vue/object-curly-newline.description: Enforce consistent line breaks after opening and before closing braces in `<template>`

vue/object-curly-spacing.description: Enforce consistent spacing inside braces in `<template>`

vue/object-property-newline.description: Enforce placing object properties on separate lines in `<template>`

vue/object-shorthand.description: Require or disallow method and property shorthand syntax for object literals in `<template>`

vue/operator-linebreak.description: Enforce consistent linebreak style for operators in `<template>`

vue/padding-line-between-blocks.description: require or disallow padding lines between blocks

vue/prefer-separate-static-class.description: require static class names in template to be in a separate `class` attribute

vue/prefer-template.description: Require template literals instead of string concatenation in `<template>`

vue/quote-props.description: Require quotes around object literal property names in `<template>`

vue/space-in-parens.description: Enforce consistent spacing inside parentheses in `<template>`

vue/space-infix-ops.description: Require spacing around infix operators in `<template>`

vue/space-unary-ops.description: Enforce consistent spacing before or after unary operators in `<template>`

vue/template-curly-spacing.description: Require or disallow spacing around embedded expressions of template strings in `<template>`

jsonc/array-bracket-spacing.description: disallow or enforce spaces inside of brackets

jsonc/key-spacing.description: enforce consistent spacing between keys and values in object literal properties

jsonc/no-dupe-keys.description: disallow duplicate keys in object literals

jsonc/no-floating-decimal.description: disallow leading or trailing decimal points in numeric literals

jsonc/no-octal-escape.description: disallow octal escape sequences in string literals

jsonc/no-unicode-codepoint-escapes.description: disallow Unicode code point escape sequences.

jsonc/object-curly-newline.description: enforce consistent line breaks inside braces

jsonc/object-property-newline.description: enforce placing object properties on separate lines

jsonc/quote-props.description: require quotes around object literal property names

jsonc/quotes.description: enforce use of double or single quotes

jsonc/vue-custom-block/no-parsing-error.description: disallow parsing errors in Vue custom blocks

jsonc/sort-array-values.description: require array values to be sorted

jsonc/sort-keys.description: require object keys to be sorted
require object keys to be sorted

style/spaced-comment.description: Enforce consistent spacing after the `//` or `/*` in a comment

yaml/block-mapping.description: require or disallow block style mappings.

yaml/block-mapping-question-indicator-ne.description: enforce consistent line breaks after `?` indicator

yaml/block-sequence.description: require or disallow block style sequences.

yaml/block-sequence-hyphen-indicator-new.description: enforce consistent line breaks after `-` indicator

yaml/flow-mapping-curly-newline.description: enforce consistent line breaks inside braces

yaml/flow-sequence-bracket-newline.description: enforce linebreaks after opening and before closing flow sequence brackets

yaml/flow-sequence-bracket-spacing.description: enforce consistent spacing inside flow sequence brackets

yaml/key-spacing.description: enforce consistent spacing between keys and values in mapping pairs

yaml/plain-scalar.description: require or disallow plain style scalar.

yaml/quotes.description: enforce the consistent use of either double, or single quotes

yaml/spaced-comment.description: enforce consistent spacing after the `#` in a comment

yaml/vue-custom-block/no-parsing-error.description: disallow parsing errors in Vue custom blocks

no-undef.description: Disallow the use of undeclared variables unless mentioned in `/*global */` comments

style/eol-last.description: Require or disallow newline at the end of files

ts/consistent-type-imports.description: Enforce consistent usage of type imports

ts/no-use-before-define.description: Disallow the use of variables before they are defined

ts/no-var-requires.description: Disallow `require` statements except in import statements

unicode-bom.description: Require or disallow Unicode byte order mark (BOM)

ts/await-thenable.description: Disallow awaiting a value that is not a Thenable

ts/no-floating-promises.description: Require Promise-like statements to be handled appropriately

ts/no-for-in-array.description: Disallow iterating over an array with a for-in loop

ts/no-misused-promises.description: Disallow Promises in places not designed to handle them

ts/no-unnecessary-type-assertion.description: Disallow type assertions that do not change the type of an expression

ts/no-unsafe-argument.description: Disallow calling a function with a value with type `any`

ts/no-unsafe-assignment.description: Disallow assigning a value with type `any` to variables and properties

ts/no-unsafe-call.description: Disallow calling a value with type `any`

ts/no-unsafe-member-access.description: Disallow member access on a value with type `any`

ts/no-unsafe-return.description: Disallow returning a value with type `any` from a function

ts/restrict-plus-operands.description: Require both operands of addition to be the same type and be `bigint`, `number`, or `string`

ts/restrict-template-expressions.description: Enforce template literal expressions to be of `string` type

ts/unbound-method.description: Enforce unbound methods are called with their expected scope
